official_title: Resolution declaring a vacancy in the office of U.S. Senator for the State of New Hampshire.

summary.text: Declares a vacancy in the Office of United States Senator for the State of New Hampshire for the term commencing January 3, 1975 effective September 1, 1975. Provides that John A. Durkin and Louis C. Wyman, shall each receive a prorated portion of the annual salary of a United States Senator from January 3, 1975, through the date of passage of this resolution.

titles.title: Resolution declaring a vacancy in the office of U.S. Senator for the State of New Hampshire.
